title: Look no further! You've found home. Specials and Tours Available!
posting_body: Up To 2 Months Free on Select Apartments
Pause, Play A garden campus with an expansive outdoor experience.
A prime location in the heart of Santa Clara.
Welcome to The Benton Apartments, where every aspect of living has been designed to help you reclaim and restore.
At The Benton Apartments, we know the key to good living is balance.

COMMUNAL & COMPLIMENTARY AMENITIES • Rooftop pool and clubhouse experience with dual-sided fireplace, lounge decks, and outdoor shower stalls • 24/7 fitness center featuring indoor/outdoor space, strength studio, cardio training, and Serenity Studio yoga space • 3 outdoor barbecue stations, dining deck and lounge lawn with urban forest • Four outdoor zones including Field, Garden, Canopy and Grove • Central courtyard featuring a volleyball court and hammock seating • Boardwalk and outdoor “beach” • Bike Room with Fix-It Station •

Think Tank featuring private conference room, printer, and TV with guest connect • Open air atrium with yard games • LATCH™ keyless entry • 24/7 package pickup from Hub by Amazon • Controlled access •

Wi-Fi provided in common areas • Digital thermostat • Electric vehicle charging stations • Muddy Paw, a pet Spa with towel service, sustainable shampoo, and pet selfie station • Gated dog park with agility course and custom bench seating •
Skip the scale – pets of all sizes welcome • Complimentary treats and water at our leasing office
588 El Camino Real Santa Clara, CA 95050
Managed By: Prometheus Real Estate Group, Inc.*
